titleStmt.title: The copie of a letter sent to Monsieur de Beauuoir lord embassador for the French king vvherin is shewed the late attempt of a Iesuite who would haue killed the kings Maiestie with a knife.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Short and are to be sold at the great north dore of Poules by Iohn Flasket,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the great north dore of Poules
